statements: SELECT ad_id, ad_size, publication_date, advertiser_name FROM advertising_placements
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_size, ad_id, publication_date FROM advertising_placements
SELECT ad_size, advertiser_name FROM advertising_placements
SELECT publication_date FROM advertising_placements
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements
SELECT ad_id, ad_size, publication_date, advertiser_name FROM advertising_placements WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT ad_size, advertiser_name FROM advertising_placements WHERE ad_size LIKE '%x%' AND advertiser_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT publication_date, ad_size FROM advertising_placements ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, advertiser_name FROM advertising_placements WHERE ad_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes ORDER BY size_name DESC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM publication_dates WHERE publication_type = 'Magazine';
SELECT ad_size_id, width, height FROM ad_sizes WHERE width > 200 AND height > 100;
SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM publication_dates WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes WHERE size_name LIKE '%large%';
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes WHERE width > 100 AND height > 50;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM publication_dates WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_size_id, size_name, width, height FROM ad_sizes ORDER BY size_name DESC;
SELECT publication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM publication_dates GROUP BY publication_name;
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes WHERE width BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND height BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM AdSizes;
SELECT ad_id, size, price FROM AdSizes WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PublicationDates ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT advertiser_name, contact_email FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 2;
SELECT ad_id, size, price FROM AdSizes WHERE size LIKE '%medium%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT ad_id, size, price FROM AdSizes WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT date_id, publication_date FROM PublicationDates WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date ASC
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name, contact_email FROM Advertisers WHERE LENGTH(advertiser_name) > 10 ORDER BY advertiser_name ASC
SELECT * FROM AdSizes JOIN PublicationDates ON AdSizes.ad_id = PublicationDates.date_id WHERE size LIKE '%large%' AND publication_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT AdSizes.ad_id, AdSizes.size, Advertisers.advertiser_name FROM AdSizes INNER JOIN Advertisers ON AdSizes.ad_id = Advertisers.advertiser_id ORDER BY AdSizes.size DESC
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes ORDER BY size_id DESC;
SELECT ad_id, size_description FROM ad_sizes WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, publication_name, frequency FROM publications WHERE audience_size > 10000 ORDER BY publication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name, contact_phone FROM advertisers WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes ORDER BY publication_date DESC, ad_id ASC;
SELECT ad_id, size_description FROM ad_sizes WHERE size_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, publication_name, frequency FROM ad_sizes JOIN publications ON ad_sizes.size_id = publications.publication_id WHERE ad_sizes.ad_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ad_placements WHERE placement_cost > 1000 ORDER BY placement_date DESC;
SELECT advertiser_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes;
SELECT id, publication_name, publication_date FROM publications WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT name, contact_email, phone_number FROM advertisers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, ad_id, publication_id, placement_date FROM placements ORDER BY placement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM ad_sizes WHERE width > 300 ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM publications WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM advertisers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT ad_id, publication_id, advertiser_id FROM placements WHERE placement_date >= '2022-01-01' AND placement_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regions WHERE circulation > 50000 ORDER BY region_name ASC, location DESC;
